mapper.select: SELECT result.post_id, result.board_category, result.post_head, result.post_content, result.created_date, result.updated_date, result.post_count, result.post_likes, result.user_name, result.user_image, result.reply_count FROM (select sr2.*, sb.board_category, rownum as rn from( SELECT sp.post_id, sp.board_id, sp.post_head, sp.post_content, sp.created_date, sp.updated_date, sp.post_count, sp.post_likes, nvl(sr.reply_count, 0) as reply_count, su.user_name, su.user_image FROM SAC_POST sp LEFT JOIN ( SELECT post_id, COUNT(*) as reply_count FROM sac_reply GROUP BY post_id ) sr ON sp.post_id = sr.post_id LEFT JOIN sac_users su ON sp.user_id = su.user_id where sp.post_id = #{post_id} ORDER BY sp.post_id DESC ) sr2 left join sac_board sb on sr2.board_id = sb.board_id) result
